description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sumit Surai Featured Posts with Multiple Custom Groups (FPMCG) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Featured Posts with Multiple Custom Groups (FPMCG): from n/a through 4.0.

product.name: Featured Posts with Multiple Custom Groups (FPMCG)
